instanceVariables.name: totalFacilitySlots
instanceVariables.desc: Slots available on this node to build facilities.

instanceVariables.name: facilityList
instanceVariables.desc: JSON array containing object UIDs of the facilities built on this planet.

instanceVariables.name: connectionList
instanceVariables.desc: JSON array of UIDs. Which nodes are connected to this one in the supply network.

instanceVariables.name: explorationLevel
instanceVariables.desc: Exploration status of this planet: 0/uncharted, 1/scanned, or 2/explored.

instanceVariables.name: traitList
instanceVariables.desc: JSON array of string trait names.

instanceVariables.name: quantiaRate
instanceVariables.desc: Rate of Quantia income from having this planet in supply network.

instanceVariables.name: stelliumRate
instanceVariables.desc: Rate of Stellium income from having this node in supply network.
